          <title>
            <string language="en">Burning of fossil fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennen der Fossilbrennstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brûlure des combustibles fossiles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Queimadura de combustíveis fossil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bruciandosi dei combustibili fossili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάψιμο των απολιθωμένων καυσίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El quemarse de combustibles fósiles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up for burning of fossil fuels giving off carbon dioxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>

          <structure>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation für das Brennen der Fossilbrennstoffe, die weg vom 
Kohlendioxyd geben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale pour la brûlure des combustibles fossiles dégageant 
l'anhydride carbonique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental para queimar-se dos combustíveis fossil que dão fora do
dióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale per bruciarsi dei combustibili fossili che danno fuori 
dell'anidride carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση για 
το κάψιμο των απολιθωμένων καυσίμων που εκπέμπουν το διοξείδιο 
του άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental para quemarse de los combustibles fósiles que emiten el 
bióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
